New Records: Lockie Ferguson became the first bowler at a World Cup to bowl four maidens
Key Match Events: PNG lost early wickets and were bowled out for 78
Pre-Game Insights: The match was rain-delayed by an hour but no overs were lost; both teams were already eliminated from Super Eight contention in Group C
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played despite a one-hour rain delay; teams were already eliminated from the tournament
